content: Shopping for clothes, returning books to the library, watering the plants—I feel like there's never enough time in the day. Am I asking for too much?
info: 闲聊-中午（11-14）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊
闲聊-中午（11-14）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
Concerning the most challenging of life's three great conundrums—
"What shall I have for lunch?"
info: 闲聊-中午（11-14）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
Yee~ "Have you eaten yet?"
I've heard this is a common afternoon greeting along an Eastern Astralink.
Though recently, I've noticed they've switched to asking "Have you ordered anything?" instead...
info: 闲聊-中午（11-14）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content: (Drowsy)... If we're chatting,{短暂停}have you eaten yet?
info: 闲聊-中午（11-14）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
The three daily meals and the changing of seasons
are perhaps the most constant expectations in our ordinary lives,
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, did you enjoy your lunch today?
info: 闲聊-中午（11-14）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
It seems to be because of these food delivery apps...
Everyone's eating habits
are truly becoming more and more diverse these days.
info: 闲聊-中午（11-14）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊

content:
My solution was to write menu items on wooden boards,
then strike them with my palm—
whichever board breaks, we'll have whatever dish was written on it.
info: 闲聊-中午（11-14）闲聊_幻雪-单一闲聊
